H1_split_answer1:
The Demon Slayer stands at the entrance of the underground square, the weight of the world resting on his shoulders. The air is thick with tension as Elara's fiery determination clashes with Thalion's calm wisdom. He knows that every choice he makes could alter the fate of Henesys and its innocent inhabitants.

**What will you choose?**

A) **Join Elara in the attack** - Take the fight to the Black Wings before they can strike, relying on speed and surprise.

B) **Heed Thalion's advice and gather intel** - Take a step back to assess the situation, ensuring that any action taken is well-informed.

C) **Seek out his brother Damien** - Attempt to reach out to his brother, who has fallen into darkness, in hopes of bringing him back to the light.

D) **Confront the Black Mage directly** - Challenge the source of the evil head-on, risking everything for a chance to end the threat once and for all.

Choose wisely, for the path you take will shape the destiny of many. What will it be?
H1_split_answer2:
The Demon Slayer stands at the edge of the ancient shrine, the air thick with tension as the whispers of the forest echo around him. He knows that each choice he makes could alter the course of the battle against the Black Mage and his minions. 

**What will you choose?**

A) Attempt to defeat the spirit and claim the artifact.  
B) Sneak into the Black Wings' meeting to gather crucial information.  
C) Return to the resistance to warn them of the impending attack.  
D) Confront the spirit and demand its assistance in the fight against the Black Mage.  

Make your choice wisely!
